name: AMAUCP | Coming Soon Page / Maintenance Mode
author: WPAmaNuke

sections.description:
Create your coming soon page / maintenance mode / under construction page in wordpress easily without coding knowledge. AMAUCP Coming Soon Page is a wordpresss plugin to build coming soon page with responsive design and will adapt to any device.

Features

  • Unique Under Construction Template
  • Countdown Timer Support
  • Easy Subscribe form to collect email to custom post or send specific email which has been set
  • SEO Settings From Admin Area
  • User Roles Support to restrict user view the coming soon page
  • Social Media Integrated
  • Live Preview for Under Construction for each template
  • Responsive Design
sections.faq:
Where is the documentation ?

Here it is Coming Soon Documentation
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • First Approved 6 January 2018
  • Use Admin Page Framework to create option panel

1.0.1

  • Change Default Theme
  • Add 2 New Theme : Nano , XDefault
  • Add Feature Class : Quotes, About , Service, Teams , Contact

1.0.2

  • Add 2 New Under Construction Page Theme
  • Fix CSS
